stepItems.title: How happy are you with the work completed?

description:
ContestDomination.com is the best platform out there to run competitions and generate new leads for your business.

It's pretty straightforward to setup but if you don't have the time or energy to do it yourself we're here to help.

We will write attention-grabbing copy that will explain the merits of entering your competition as well as putting together a custom feature image to showcase your prizes.

Leave your contest to the professionals.

What can I expect?

  • Write copy for the competition page thanks page and social media sharing
  • Create feature image to showcase prizes
  • Setup custom domain name OR install on Facebook page
  • Ensure competition is working and ready to go for customer
title: Setup your ContestDomination contest and generate more leads
